backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining user, project, contractor, bill, NMR, and payment types with in‑memory maps and authorization/storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module returning previous actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests tied to two authentication-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark UI color tokens and layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, auto admin bootstrap, routing, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/AppShel: Layout wrapper with sidebar and scrollable main content area.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/RoleBad: Badge component mapping user roles to display labels and variants.
frontend/src/components/AppShell/Sidebar: Left sidebar with navigation items, role-based visibility, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/dialogs/DeleteWi: A dialog component prompting users to enter a password before confirming a delete action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, users, projects, and other domain data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Utility functions for adding days and formatting dates.
frontend/src/lib/formatters/currency.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/lib/roleAccess.ts: Helpers for checking user permissions and converting roles to and from strings.
frontend/src/lib/units.ts: Defines a constant list of measurement units and a Unit type.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/analytics/AnalyticsPa: Static analytics placeholder page describing upcoming dashboard features.
Dialog component for creating bills with form fields, validation, and submission using createBill mutation.
frontend/src/pages/bills/BillsPage.tsx: Main bills listing page with table view, view/create/delete actions, and role‑based access.
Read‑only dialog that displays all bill details including pricing, status, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/contractors/Contracto: Dialog for creating or editing contractors with form state, validation, and create/update mutations.
Contractors listing page with filters, view/edit/delete actions, and role‑based access control.
Read‑only dialog showing full contractor details including project, pricing, and attachments.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Displays dashboard statistics for bills and payments and renders summary cards and recent activity info.
frontend/src/pages/Deactivated.tsx: Displays an account deactivation message with a logout button.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with branding that triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRFormDialog.tsx: Provides a dialog form to create weekly NMR records with dynamic entry rows and automatic amount calculation.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRPage.tsx: Lists all NMR records with actions to create, view, and delete entries based on user permissions.
frontend/src/pages/nmr/NMRViewDialog.tsx: Shows a read‑only dialog displaying full NMR details including entries and calculated values.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFormD: Dialog form for creating payments tied to approved bills, calculating balances and validating input.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentsPage: Displays a table of all payments with options to add or delete payments depending on user role.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating and saving a new user profile using backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectFormD: Dialog form for creating or editing a project, handling field state, validation, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectsPage: Projects list page with table display, view/edit/delete actions, and dialogs for managing projects.
frontend/src/pages/projects/ProjectViewD: Read-only dialog that displays full project details including budget, dates, addresses, links, and status.
Dialog form for creating or editing users with validation, role selection, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/pages/users/UsersPage.tsx: Users list page with table display, view/edit/delete actions, and dialogs for managing user accounts.
Read-only dialog showing user details including role, status, and principal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s architecture state, planned backend stack, role rules, IDs, and existing feature definitions for the PayGo system.
